meanings.definition: Waste matter discharged from the bowels; feces.
meanings.sent1: The dog left excrement on the grass.
meanings.sent2: The farmer cleaned up the excrement from the barn.
meanings.sent3: The excrement in the yard made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The excrement in the toilet was a reminder of the previous meal.
meanings.sent5: The smell of excrement filled the room, making everyone uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: Any waste matter that is excreted from the body.
meanings.sent1: The nurse disposed of the patient's excrement carefully.
meanings.sent2: The compost pile contained various types of excrement.
meanings.sent3: The excrement in the trash bin attracted flies.
meanings.sent4: The excrement of the earthworms enriched the soil.
meanings.sent5: The excrement of the birds painted patterns on the sidewalk.
